product_description: Dilettante Mocha Cafe brand Rheingold Dark Bulk Toffees, perishable, sold individual pieces out of retail display cases. Bulk truffle boxes sent to retail stores contains correct label: "***Dilettante Mocha Cafe Rheingold Dark Bulk Toffee*** UPC 10083 15052***Contains: Milk, Almond, Pecan***Dilettante Mocha Cafe, Tukwila, WA 98188, dilettantemochacafe.com"
